item.description: 依赖 vim-jsbeautify js-beautify js-beautify的安装： 1 2 3 npm -g install js-beautify # 或 pip install jsbeautifier 配置快捷键 1 2 3 4 vmap <leader>jsb :'<,'>!js-beautify -i<CR>autocmd FileType javascript noremap <buffer> <leader>jsb :call JsBeautify()<CR>autocmd FileType html noremap <buffer> <leader>htmlb :call HtmlBeautify()<CR>autocmd FileType css noremap <buffer> <leader>cssb :call CSSBeautify()<CR>
